thought: To craft white_stained_glass, I need to first craft white_dye, which requires placing a lily_of_the_valley in the crafting grid. I will move the lily_of_the_valley from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
